parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "app_title_bar",
    "type": "title_bar",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "application_name": "LibreOffice Writer",
      "document_name": "Sem título 1"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_arquivo",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Arquivo",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_editar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Editar",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_exibir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Exibir",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_inserir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Inserir",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formatar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formatar",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_estilos",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_tabela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Tabela",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formulario",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formulário",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ferramentas",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ferramentas",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_janela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Janela",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ajuda",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "region": "top-menu",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_new_document",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Novo documento",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_open_document",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Abrir documento",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_save_document",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Salvar documento",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Imprimir",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print_preview",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Visualizar impressão",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_cut",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Recortar",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_copy",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Copiar",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_paste",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Colar",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_undo",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Desfazer",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_redo",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Refazer",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_find_replace",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Localizar e substituir",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_style_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_name_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Arial",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_size_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "12 pt",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_bold",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_italic",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_underline",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_strikethrough",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_color",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_highlight_color",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Cor do destaque",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_left",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Alinhar à esquerda",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_center",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_right",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_justify",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Justificar",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content-top"
  },
  {
    "id": "vertical_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content-left"
  },
  {
    "id": "document_editor",
    "type": "text_area",
    "text": "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.",
    "region": "main-content",
    "actions": ["onInput", "onSelectionChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_font": "Arial",
      "current_font_size": "12 pt",
      "current_style": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
      "cursor_position": "end_of_text"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_panel",
    "type": "panel",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_close_button",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Fechar",
    "region": "right-sidebar-header",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties_menu_button",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Menu",
    "region": "right-sidebar-header",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_style",
    "type": "section",
    "text": "Estilo",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_style_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_style_update_button",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Atualizar estilo",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_character",
    "type": "section",
    "text": "Caractere",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_font_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "Arial",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_font_size_dropdown",
    "type": "select",
    "text": "12 pt",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_bold",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_italic",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_underline",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_strikethrough",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_font_color",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_character_highlight_color",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Cor do destaque",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_section_paragraph",
    "type": "section",
    "text": "Parágrafo",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "state": "expanded"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_align_left",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Alinhar à esquerda",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_align_center",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_align_right",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_justify",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Justificar",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_line_spacing_1",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 1",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_line_spacing_1_5",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 1.5",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_line_spacing_2",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha 2",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_paragraph_background_color",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Cor de fundo do parágrafo",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_label_spacing",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Espaço:",
    "region": "right-sidebar"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_spacing_before_paragraph",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "unit": "cm",
      "label": "Espaço antes do parágrafo"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_spacing_after_paragraph",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "unit": "cm",
      "label": "Espaço depois do parágrafo"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_label_indentation",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Recuo:",
    "region": "right-sidebar"
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_indentation_before_text",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "unit": "cm",
      "label": "Recuo antes do texto"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_indentation_after_text",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "unit": "cm",
      "label": "Recuo depois do texto"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_indentation_first_line",
    "type": "input",
    "text": "0,00 cm",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "unit": "cm",
      "label": "Recuo da primeira linha"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_properties",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "selected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_styles",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_gallery",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Galeria",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_navigator",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Navegador",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_pages",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Páginas",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_images",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Imagens",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_tables",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Tabelas",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_forms",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Formulários",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_tab_search",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Pesquisar",
    "region": "right-sidebar-tabs",
    "state": "unselected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_page_count",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Página 1 de 1",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_word_count",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "91 palavras, 574 caracteres",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_page_style",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Estilo de página Padrão",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_language",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Português (Brasil)",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_out",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Diminuir zoom",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_slider",
    "type": "slider",
    "text": "Zoom",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "100%"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_in",
    "type": "icon_button",
    "text": "Aumentar zoom",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  }
]

ui.text: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
